alert.note: Alert for Flathead; Lincoln (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Avalanche Watch issued February 20 at 7:07AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: The following message is transmitted at the request of Flathead Avalanche Center Hungry Horse MT. ...AVALANCHE WATCH ISSUED BY THE FLATHEAD AVALANCHE CENTER... 07:00 MST Mon Feb 20 2023 The Flathead Avalanche Center in Hungry Horse has issued a BACKCOUNTRY AVALANCHE WATCH for the following areas: NWS Missoula MT - MTC 029 (Flathead County)...MTC 053 (Lincoln County) * WHAT...The avalanche danger will rise Monday and Monday night as a powerful storm sweeps across the forecast region. If the storm develops as forecasted, the likelihood and size of triggered and natural avalanches will increase. * WHERE...On and below steep slopes at upper elevations in the Whitefish Range. * WHEN...In effect from Mon 07:00 MST to Tue 07:00 MST. * IMPACTS...Recent heavy snow combined with wind will likely create widespread areas of unstable snow. * PRECAUTIONARY / PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...Very dangerous avalanche conditions. Travel in avalanche terrain is not recommended. Consult http://www.flatheadavalanche.org/ or www.avalanche.org for more detailed information. Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the coverage area of this or any avalanche center.
